name: Super Drill Diver!
description:
UPDATE: Bug where certain values don't update.

UPDATE2: There was a glitch with the enter key. Pretty sure its fixed.

UPDATE3: Pretty sure browser version is fine, go for it!

Help Drillary descend into the catacombs of the ancient sunken temple. Wrought with monsters, her only hope is her trusty Drillerator - A super high-tech drill that can fire laser beams!

(About 25 floors of meaningful content…) Thanks for checking us out!

Our social medias… (Twitter!) @mrbluemydude (Programmer/ Graphics) @CFY98 (Music)

Made for Ludum Dare 48!

Debugging the WebGL version, but I think it's mostly fine save for the audio. Memory issues I'm sure.

"Thanks for playing my game!"
